articles.title: Prenatal cannabis exposure linked to heightened risk of ADHD symptoms - PsyPost
articles.description: A meta-analysis of over 200,000 participants found prenatal cannabis exposure significantly increases the risk of ADHD symptoms in offspring and suggests a possible risk for ASD. This highlights the need for caution regarding cannabis use during pregnancy.

articles.title: Man started doing 150 burpees every day after a health scare - Business Insider
articles.description: Ryan Peck started doing 150 burpees daily after recovering from pulmonary embolisms. He doesn't like them but appreciates the benefits.

articles.title: 'Parrot fever' outbreak in 5 European countries kills 5 people - Livescience.com
articles.description: Most people involved in the current parrot fever outbreak developed the disease after being exposed to infected wild or pet birds, the WHO said.
articles.content:
An outbreak of a respiratory infection that most often affects birds has killed five people in Europe, the World Health Organization (WHO) warns.

articles.title: The direction of theta and alpha travelling waves modulates human memory processing - Nature.com
articles.description: How does the brain support a wide range of behaviours? Mohan et al. examine how the direction of travelling waves of neural oscillations coordinates interactions between brain regions to support different functional processes in memory.
